audioText: Quand les feuilles des arbres meurent, l'automne arrive.
question: Quand les feuilles des arbres ______, l'automne arrive.
explanation: The text states 'Quand les feuilles des arbres meurent, l'automne arrive' - When the leaves of the trees die, autumn arrives. The subject 'les feuilles' (the leaves) is third-person plural, so the verb 'mourir' must be conjugated as 'meurent'.
